divs: Sighting Detailsappeared to be moving in a circle over the water, either there were at least 3 lights or it circled 3 times i was in my backyard smoking a cig talking to my girlfriend on the phone i noticed a bright amber light brighter then the aircraft flying the sky i did not know what the light was i was almost in shock this is the third time i have seen this type of light move out of my visual range
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
